title: Apple Salad With Warm Camembert Dressing
summary: Need a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian main course? Apple Salad With Warm Camembert Dressing could be an amazing recipe to try. One portion of this dish contains approximately 31g of protein, 38g of fat, and a total of 610 calories. For $6.07 per serving, this recipe covers 47% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 2. 10 people found this recipe to be tasty and satisfying. If you have salt and pepper, cider vinegar, sturdy greens - i use a rocket spinach mix, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the cider vinegar you could follow this main course with the Vinegar Pie as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 95%, this dish is amazing. Similar recipes are Warm apple & fig salad with maple dijon dressing, Spinach Salad with Warm Bacon and Apple Cider Dressing, and Roasted Sweet Potato Salad With Warm Bacon Apple Cider Dressing.
